title: Mastering Your Microwave
brief_description: Many new microwave owners experience great frustration when trying to learn the techniques and principles of microwave cooking. They often feel they will never master the art. The “Mastering Your Microwave” video cookbook collection has been produced by international microwave consultant, Joan McDermott, to help overcome these problems. Everyday recipes including roast meats, souffles, vegetables and fish are included on this video. Rated: G
